bibl.title: Gal. ii. 14 ÙryopodoËsin. <orthopodousin>
G.D. KILPATRICK, The Principles and Practice of New Testament Textual Criticism. Collected Essays
bibl.author: KILPATRICK, G.D.

bibl.note: Reproduit de: Neutestamentliche Studien für Rudolf Bultmann = ZNTW. Beiheft 21 (Berlin, 1954) pp. 269-274. - Investigates the meaning of the word, using the evidence of documentary papyri.
G.D. KILPATRICK, The Principles and Practice of New Testament Textual Criticism. Collected Essays (Leuven, 1990) pp. 437-444.
